mapper.select: (SELECT id, create_time, 1 AS type FROM bs_post WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND deleted = 0) UNION (SELECT id, create_time, 2 AS type FROM bs_moment WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND deleted = 0) UNION (SELECT id, create_time, 3 AS type FROM bs_note WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND deleted = 0) UNION (SELECT id, create_time, 4 AS type FROM bs_note_chapter WHERE FIND_IN_SET(#{userId}, user_ids) AND deleted = 0) ORDER BY create_time DESC
